dark_mode.name: Dark Mode
dark_mode.desc: The dark mode display is more suitable for reducing eye strain and glare from bright screens, especially in low-light conditions.

1.title: Dark mode features have been updated, find out in this menu
1.content: Now you will be able to switch from the traditional light theme to a darker one.

2.title: Switch the toggle button to on
2.content: You can return to the previous light mode display by switching off this toggle.

language.name: Language
language.desc: Adjust your language preferences to enhance your user experience and make it easier to interact with our platform.

1.title: Language features have been updated, find out in this menu
1.content: Now you can adjust your language preferences based on the language you want.

2.title: Press the dropdown button
2.content: See the various language options in the "Language" menu.

3.title: Choose your language preferences
3.content: We will continuously update the language preferences according to your needs.
